name: Simple Space Shooter (recleun)
description:
This game is simple, it's an endless space shooter made with PICO-8 and the purpose of it was me learning game making through PICO-8. Reviews are very welcome, since this is my first published game.

Thanks to Kultisti for telling me about PICO-8.

Controls:

Left/Right Arrow - Move
Z/X - Shoot/Play
